message.content:
I need to identify the total income from ordinary activities and its constituent line items from the income statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see that "Total Revenue" represents the total income, with a value of 7099920.95.

Based on the structure of the income statement, the only constituent line item of Total Revenue is "Main Business Revenue" which also has a value of 7099920.95.

Therefore:
- The total income value is 7099920.95
- The sub-item value (Main Business Revenue) is 7099920.95

```json
{"solution": {'value': '7099920.95', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '7099920.95'}}}
```
